info.name: testing lossy video compression
info.description: testing lossy video compression left is uncompressed right is compressed, compresses 8 pixels into 3

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define COMPRESSION 8
#define QUALITY 4
#define PRECISION .5

#define KEYFRAME_INTERVAL 400
#define KEYFRAME step(.5,float(iFrame%KEYFRAME_INTERVAL))

#define PI 3.141592653

#define VIDEO_WIDTH 640.
#define VIDEO_HEIGHT 360.
#define VIDEO_SIZE vec2(VIDEO_WIDTH,VIDEO_HEIGHT)
